mapper.select: select balance from employerInfo where employerId=#{employerId}
mapper.update: update employerInfo set balance=balance-#{balance} where employerId=#{employerId}
mapper.select: select * from tradeWork where employerId=#{employerId} and worksId=#{worksId}

SELECT t1.*,t2.worksTitle,t2.worksPrice,t2.annexPath,t3.providerId,t3.providerName,t3.phoneNumber,t4.demandTypeName FROM tradeWork t1 INNER JOIN works t2 INNER JOIN providerAccount t3 INNER JOIN demandType t4 ON t1.worksId = t2.worksId AND t2.providerId = t3.providerId AND t2.worksTypeId=t4.demandTypeId WHERE t1.employerId =#{employerId}
mapper.update: update tradeWork set tradeStatus=#{tradeStatus} where tradeWorksId=#{tradeWorksId} and employerId=#{employerId}
mapper.select: SELECT t1.*,t2.worksTitle,t2.worksPrice,t2.annexPath,t3.employerName,t3.phoneNumber,t4.demandTypeName FROM tradeWork t1 INNER JOIN works t2 INNER JOIN employerAccount t3 INNER JOIN demandType t4 ON t1.worksId = t2.worksId AND t1.employerId = t3.employerId AND t2.worksTypeId=t4.demandTypeId WHERE t1.providerId =#{providerId}
mapper.update: update tradeWork set tradeStatus=#{tradeStatus} where tradeWorksId=#{tradeWorksId}
